title: Radar
summaries: The Radar is an informational accessory which displays the number of nearby enemies in a 125-tile radius around the player. The Radar has a 1/10 (10%) chance of being obtained from looting regular Chests found on or near the surface, or a 1/100 (1%) chance from Wooden and Pearlwood Crates obtained via fishing. The Radar can also be purchased from the Skeleton Merchant during a Waxing Gibbous for 2 GC50 SC.

The Radar is one of the three parts necessary to make the <linked>R.E.K. 3000</linked>, with the others being the <linked>Tally Counter</linked> and the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked>, and as such is a required ingredient in <linked>crafting</linked> the <linked>Shellphone</linked>.
